name: Exigent Technologies
description:
Exigent Technologies is a full-service information technology consulting firm that implements and maintains high-performance IT systems for small and medium-sized organizations in a wide range of industries. Regardless of their size, today’s companies rely on anytime, anywhere access to information—and Exigent delivers. For smaller clients, we provide customized support for total IT needs.
For larger enterprises, we complement internal IT resources for higher levels of efficiency and productivity. Established in 1997, Exigent brings proven experience and expertise to every engagement. We differentiate ourselves through a consistent emphasis on integrity, responsiveness and value-added service.
